alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Itawamba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 29 at 3:57PM CST until November 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Mississippi, including the following counties, Calhoun, Chickasaw, Itawamba and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 357 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Amory, Houston, Okolona, Smithville, Tremont, Slate Springs, New Wren, Trebloc, New Salem, Pyland, Nettleton, Hatley, Woodland, Egypt, Wren, Buena Vista, Bigbee, Van Vleet, McCondy and Becker. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
